title: Website Devloper/Designer
job_overview:
We are looking for a reliable and skilled Website Developer/Designer to create custom websites for various clients, including service-based businesses, eCommerce stores, and other niche industries. While we don’t require websites to be built entirely from scratch, we need someone who can customize themes, integrate functionality, and occasionally write code when needed. This is a gig-based, part-time opportunity with the potential for ongoing work. YOU must have the capability to make similar sites such as Upgrade to see actual info and/or Upgrade to see actual info. Ideally the candidate will be responsive and work diligently in a fast paced environment. 

Responsibilities:
Design and develop custom, user-friendly websites using platforms like WordPress, Shopify, Webflow, Wix, or other no-code/low-code solutions.
Modify and customize themes/templates to meet specific project requirements.
Implement responsive, conversion-optimized designs that enhance user experience.
Write and edit code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, or Liquid for Shopify) when needed for customization beyond standard template modifications.
Integrate third-party tools, payment gateways, APIs, and plugins as needed.
Ensure websites are SEO-friendly, mobile-responsive, and performance-optimized.
Troubleshoot and fix technical issues or bugs.
Work collaboratively and communicate project progress effectively.
Deliver projects on time and meet client expectations.
Requirements:
Proven experience in website development and design (portfolio required).
Expertise in WordPress, Shopify, Webflow, Wix, or similar platforms.
Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, or Liquid (Shopify).
Strong UI/UX design skills with attention to detail.
Ability to create custom site functionalities beyond drag-and-drop editors.
Familiarity with SEO best practices and website performance optimization.
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently.
Reliability and responsiveness—we need someone who consistently delivers high-quality work on time.
Excellent communication skills and ability to understand client needs.
Compensation:
Project-based or hourly compensation, depending on scope.
Opportunity for ongoing work and long-term collaboration.
